basic.blooming: Flowering period April-July, fruiting period July-September
basic.color: Flower color yellow, fruit color green, dark green, yellow

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients, pH value between 6-7
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, high quality fruits in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply fertilizers one to twice on average in each month, 2-3 times in fruiting stages
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
